markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Debilitating Dichotomy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1495) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can give others a glimpse of the impossible conflicts and unchecked power that courses through your body. You learn the [_debilitating dichotomy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=750) revelation spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Debilitating Dichotomy
